data.title: Global Real Estate Development
data.meta_description: Related is dedicated to creating memorable experiences, supporting our neighbors, and giving back for a better tomorrow. Learn about our properties and initiatives.
data.text:
What's Happening Around the Company

Find out more at WynnNewYorkCity.com

Vision and Impact

Vision and Impact

On July 25, we celebrated a historic announcement: Together with Illinois Governor JB Pritzker and Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson, Related Midwest unveiled that PsiQuantum will anchor the new Illinois Quantum and Microelectronics Park at the historic U.S. Steel South Works site. The 128-acre campus will serve as a hub for innovation, nurturing groundbreaking projects like PsiQuantum’s venture to build the world's first commercially useful quantum computer.

Vision and Impact

Vision and Impact

Urban Alliance internship program

Six interns for six Related properties in the Chicago Area: a year-long, meaningful hands-on work experience that’s drawing to a close for these wonderful young individuals, made possible by Urban Alliance, Related Affordable and Related Affordable Foundation. We are so grateful for the hard work of these interns and their commitment to our communities.

Vision & Impact

Vision & Impact

Coming soon to the Chicago waterfront where Lake Michigan meets the Chicago River, 400 Lake Shore will present two elegant towers designed by Skidmore, Owings & Merrill with David Childs. The residence will offer both luxury rental and affordable homes, as well as 4.5 acres of open green space for both residents and the public to enjoy.

Vision and Impact

Vision and Impact

New York Development and Construction teams support NYC's Hudson Guild

On April 17, over 100 volunteers from Related's New York development and construction teams spent some fun and meaningful time with Hudson Guild. At the Fulton Center, several teams spent quality time with senior residents, playing rounds of bingo and serving them lunch. At the Elliott Center, volunteers engaged with local pre-k children, while also working on beautifying the park and common grounds.

Vision and Impact

Vision and Impact

In the March 28 episode of Goldman Sachs Talks, Jeff Blau joined Goldman Sachs President and COO John Waldron to discuss how the company navigated economic cycles during the construction of Hudson Yards to bring the sustainable neighborhood to life. Today, Hudson Yards stands as the largest commercial development in New York since the construction of Rockefeller Center in the 1930s, as well as Manhattan’s first LEED Gold certified neighborhood.

Vision and Impact

Vision and Impact

Related Affordable provides multi-bedroom apartments

Large multi-bedroom apartments in affordable housing buildings, located in metro areas, allow entire families to live together and thrive in the neighborhoods that are close to their workplaces and their kids’ schools. Related Affordable is proud to continue to develop this kind of housing across the U.S.

Vision and Impact

Vision and Impact

Related Beal pioneers life science developments in Boston

Kim Sherman-Stamler and Bruce A. Beal, Jr. share how Related Beal has served Boston's cutting-edge life science industry for over 4 decades. By partnering with local schools and hospitals, Related Beal is creating high-tech spaces to help today and tomorrow's leaders find life-changing discoveries.

Vision and Impact

Vision and Impact

Related California celebrates 30 years of serving local communities

With over 17,000 completed residences throughout the state, Related California builds upon a legacy of collaboration with local leaders and organizations to create developments that contribute to communities in lasting and meaningful ways.

Art at Affordable Program

Related Affordable weaves artwork into residents' daily lives

Related Affordable recognizes that artwork has the ability to uplift and empower individuals and their communities. This has resulted in a program that brings contemporary artwork into Related's affordable residences, inviting creatives to share their vision with residents in a lasting and impactful way. By working with local artists and incorporating residents' feedback, Related Affordable's program sets out to improve residents' wellness and to involve them in the creative conversation. Explore some of the most recent artistic collaborations below.

Read More

Affordable Spotlight

Related Affordable Housing

Related Affordable Housing

Related Affordable's commitment to supporting affordable communities

Preserving affordability while improving the lives of our communities is a key goal for Related Affordable, a foundational part of Related Companies. Learn more about Related Affordable's important work in this video, which focuses on the comprehensive rehabilitation of Somers Point Apartments.

Related Affordable Housing

Related Affordable Housing

New playspace unveiled at Somers Point Apartments

200 volunteers + 4 days of hard work = two brand new playgrounds for the children of Somers Point Apartments!

Thank you our amazing partners at KABOOM!, Somers Point City Council President Janice Johnston, the local volunteers and our Related and Related Affordable Foundation colleagues who, together, made into a reality the playgrounds imagined and designed by the Somers Point kids!

Related Affordable Housing

Related Affordable Housing

On April 11, a historic milestone was achieved with the approval of Phase II of the Willets Point Redevelopment Plan. Willets Point will introduce the New York City's largest all-affordable housing project in 40 years, as well as its first-ever soccer stadium run by NYCFC, shaping an even more vibrant neighborhood and brighter future for Queens.

Related Affordable Housing

Related Affordable Housing

"Build Chicago Together" art mural unveiled at HIRE360 Training and Business Development Center

The Related Affordable Foundation, Related Midwest and nonprofit After School Matters brought together young residents of Chicago affordable developments to create a mural honoring their city and its workers, dubbed “Building Chicago Together.” Local artist Erick “ROHO” Garcia designed the artwork and guided teens who spent the summer developing their creative and teamwork skills.

Related Affordable Housing

Related Affordable Housing

Related Affordable Foundation and KABOOM! unveil community playspace in San Antonio

Related Affordable Foundation and KABOOM! came together once again, this time to build a community playspace at River Trails Apartments in San Antonio, Texas. We are very thankful to Councilwoman Phyllis Viagran, San Antonio Football Club, San Antonio Spurs, the local residents and all the volunteers who joined in this effort, providing this community's children an active, safe place to play and grow.

Related Affordable Housing

Related Affordable Housing

Related Affordable is nearing completion of the renovation of Park Club Apartments. The Related Affordable Foundation has partnered with the Zoological Society of Milwaukee to allow the youngest residents of the property to enjoy educational activities at the Milwaukee Zoo, organizing special classes and visits year-round.

Related Affordable Housing

Related Affordable Housing

Related Affordable Foundation and nonprofit KABOOM! celebrates kid-designed playspace

This fall, Related Affordable Foundation and nonprofit KABOOM! celebrated the creation of a kid-designed playspace at Southern Hills, which provides an active, social and safe place for kids to have fun and express themselves.

Related in the Community

Related in the Community

Hudson Yards Pickleball Tournament supports West Side Community Fund

On August 6, employees from multiple companies based in Hudson Yards participated in the Hudson Yards Pickleball Challenge. Held in the Public Square of Hudson Yards, the tournament offered participants a day of friendly competition that benefitted the West Side Community Fund, which uplifts local initiatives that impact residents in the surrounding community.

Related in the Community

Related in the Community

Related Beal team volunteers at local food drive

In July, Related Beal team members dedicated their time in support of a weekly food drive organized by Boston nonprofit Community Servings. Employees helped staff members with everything from sorting donations to packing food boxes, which will be delivered to vulnerable community members experiencing critical and chronic illnesses.

Related in the Community

Related in the Community

Related Cares Day of Service volunteers enhance shelter in NYC

On June 11, employees from energyRe and Related's Retail, Commercial Real Estate Management and Hudson Yards Experiences teams spent their Related Cares Day of Service at a local shelter for unhoused families in the South Bronx. Volunteers helped make a difference by adding fresh coats of paint to the adult meeting room and kids’ playroom, assembling furniture and sorting shelter donations.

Related in the Community

Related in the Community

Full House Fundraiser benefits Hudson Guild

On May 16, Sky Loft at 50 Hudson Yards hosted the first Full House Fundraiser to benefit Hudson Guild. Hudson Yards employees attended and donated to in support of the nonprofit's teen program, which helps enrich the lives of young people in our community.

Related in the Community

Related in the Community

Related Affordable Foundation Scholarship recipient shares program experience

Malachi Blackwood, a resident of affordable community Ocean Park Apartments in Queens, was awarded the 2023 Related Affordable Foundation Scholarship. Thanks to the program, Blackwood was able to fund his freshman year at SUNY Albany, moving him one step further to his goal of obtaining a college degree.
